articles.title: 4 Asiatic lions at Night Safari test positive for Covid-19 after exposure to infected staff - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Four Asiatic lions at the Night Safari have tested positive for Covid-19 after being exposed to staff members from Mandai Wildlife Group who were infected with the coronavirus.

articles.author: Joseph Knoop
articles.title: Fortnite Pulls the Travis Scott Emote After Astroworld Concert Tragedy - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: Epic acknowledged it's disabled the item shop's Daily section, but not given a specific reason.
articles.content:
Epic has removed the Travis Scott "Out West" dance emote from Fortnite following the rap star's deadly Astroworld concert in Houston, Texas, which killed 8 people.
Epic went so far as to temporarily… [+3080 chars]
